infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to capture job site photos and document equipment installations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to save and upload job documentation.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to verify job site arrival and track mileage.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs your location to track job site visits and equipment placement.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow MIT Dry Logs to access your camera to capture job site photos.
